data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value: SELECT C.company, (CASE WHEN( CPP.startDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate OR CPP.endDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate or ((CPP.startDate < @startDate and CPP.endDate >@endDate))) THEN (CPP.premiumAmount/CPP.daysDifference)* (CPP.daysDifference - ( CPP.daysDifference - (DATEDIFF(@endDate, @startDate)+1) )) ELSE 0 END) AS totalDailyAmount, 0.00 as TotalClaimedAmount -- COALESCE((select sum(qty*unit_price) from claims_details CD -- WHERE -- CD.employer_id=CPP.companyId and -- CD.date_of_consultation BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate -- ),0) as TotalClaimedAmount FROM company_premium_plan CPP JOIN company C ON C.companyID = CPP.companyId JOIN ( SELECT CPP.startDate + INTERVAL (t4.num*1000 + t3.num*100 + t2.num*10 + t1.num) DAY AS date FROM company_premium_plan CPP CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t1, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t2, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t3, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t4 ) AS date_range ON date_range.date BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate WHERE ((CPP.startDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate) OR (CPP.endDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate)) or ((CPP.startDate < @startDate and CPP.endDate >@endDate)) GROUP BY C.company, CPP.startDate,CPP.endDate ORDER BY C.company, date_range.date

data.name: customSqlQuery2.Sql
data.value: select C.company,0 as totalDailyAmount,COALESCE(sum(qty*unit_price),0) as TotalClaimedAmount from claims_details CD join Company C on C.CompanyID = CD.employer_id WHERE -- CD.employer_id=CPP.companyId and CD.date_of_consultation BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate group by C.Company

data.name: customSqlQuery3.Sql
data.value: SELECT C.companyID, C.company, CPP.daysDifference, CPP.premiumAmount/CPP.daysDifference as DailyAmount, CPP.startDate, CPP.endDate, CPP.premiumAmount AS totalPremiumAmount, (CASE WHEN( CPP.startDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate OR CPP.endDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate or ((CPP.startDate < @startDate and CPP.endDate >@endDate))) THEN (CPP.premiumAmount/CPP.daysDifference)* (CPP.daysDifference - ( CPP.daysDifference - (DATEDIFF(@endDate, @startDate)+1) )) ELSE 0 END) AS totalDailyAmount, COALESCE((select sum(qty*unit_price) from claims_details CD WHERE CD.employer_id=CPP.companyId and CD.date_of_consultation BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate ),0) as TotalClaimedAmount FROM company_premium_plan CPP JOIN company C ON C.companyID = CPP.companyId JOIN ( SELECT CPP.startDate + INTERVAL (t4.num*1000 + t3.num*100 + t2.num*10 + t1.num) DAY AS date FROM company_premium_plan CPP CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t1, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t2, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t3, (SELECT 0 AS num UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS t4 ) AS date_range ON date_range.date BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate WHERE ((CPP.startDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate) OR (CPP.endDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate)) or ((CPP.startDate < @startDate and CPP.endDate >@endDate)) GROUP BY C.company, CPP.startDate,CPP.endDate ORDER BY C.company, date_range.date
